basisSet.dc:title: SDB-aug-cc-pVTZ
basisSet.dct:abstract: VTZ2P Valence Triple Zeta + Polarization on All Atoms
basisSet.dc:description:
Martin/Sundermann Stuttgart Relativistic, Large Core aVTZ ECP Basis Sets ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Stuttgart Core Name Primitives Contractions Ga - As: 28 [Ar+3d] ECP28MWB (15s,11p,3d,2f) -> [4s,4p,3d,2f] In : 46 [Kr+4d] ECP46MWB (15s,11p,4d,2f) -> [4s,4p,3d,2f] Sn - Sb: 46 [Kr+4d] ECP46MWB (15s,11p,3d,2f) -> [4s,4p,3d,2f] Te : 46 [Kr+4d] ECP46MWB (16s,12p,4d,2f) -> [4s,4p,3d,2f] I : 46 [Kr+4d] ECP46MWB (15s,11p,4d,2f) -> [4s,4p,3d,2f] Xe : 46 [Kr+4d] ECP46MWB (15s,11p,3d,2f) -> [4s,4p,3d,2f]
Basis set exponents and contractions were taken from: J.M.L. Martin and A. Sundermann, J. Chem. Phys. 114, 3408 (2001).
Relativistic ECP definitions were taken from: A. Bergner, M. Dolg, W. Kuechle, H. Stoll, H. Preuss, Mol. Phys. 80,1431 (1993)
